texts.textentryhtml: Reverend Gerald S. Davies; Salomon Sale, American Art Association, New York, 4-7 April, 1923; purchased by the museum from Rene Gimpel (according to Witt Photo Archive microfiches, under Orcagna, Nardo di Cione, where location is given as The Art Museum, Princeton University).

caption: Cenni di Francesco di Ser Cenni (Italian, active 1369 - 1415), formerly attributed to Nardo di Cione Orcagna, Christ and Mary in Glory with Group of Saints, 1380–1390. Tempera on wood panel; 77 x 53.5 cm. Museum purchase, Caroline G. Mather Fund, in May 1924 (y94)
